TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NavigatedEventHandler(object sender, NavigationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NavigatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NavigatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As NavigationEventArgs)
public delegate void NavigatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, NavigationEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.summary: 代表將處理 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個事件處理常式會使用下列事件：
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>
